content:
* Stir in the cooked lentils and spinach, and cook until the spinach has wilted.
* Season the curry with salt and pepper to taste.
* Serve the lentil and vegetable curry garnished with fresh cilantro, alongside whole grain naan for dipping.

These three additional meal ideas, along with the previous ones, provide a variety of options for incorporating the brain-boosting ingredients from the list above. Remember, a balanced and diverse diet is key to supporting cognitive health. Feel free to adjust the recipes to your taste and preferences, or to incorporate other ingredients from the list as desired.
